title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected at the first time.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected at the first time.
EB: The item in the library outline view should be selectable at the first attempt.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected at the first time.
